citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:25am on
12-Sep-18.
The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee at the number on file. He confirmed that no one was
available for inspection at that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee at the number on file.  He confirmed that no one was
available for inspection at that time.
